T02D1185:30a-29: koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las rdo
T02D1185:30a-30: rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya
T02D1185:30a-31: ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po ste dang po'o /
T02D1185:30a-33: // / dbang thob pas slob dpon gyi las bya bar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir gsol pa /
T02D1185:30a-34: rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol //
T02D1185:30a-35: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1185:30a-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1185:30a-37: sbyin sreg byas nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1185:30a-38: dang por bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i don du sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1185:30a-39: de nas rab tu gnas pa'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1185:30b-0: rab tu gnas pa yang dkyil 'khor gyi thabs legs par bsdu ba na @30b yod pa'i phyir /
T02D1185:30b-1: gnyi ga yang 'dir ma brjod do //
T02D1185:30b-2: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal skyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa /
T02D1185:30b-3: koo mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o /
T02D1185:30b-5: // / gang zhig yang bsod nams 'dod pa'am srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa de rnams ni /
T02D1185:30b-6: dkyil 'khor dang rab tu gnas pa la sogs pa nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pas /
T02D1185:30b-7: gang zhig sangs rgyas nyid nges par 'dod pa de
T02D1185:30b-8: rnams kyis de'i don du gnyis pa rgyu'i dngos grub
T02D1185:30b-10: nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la //
T02D1185:30b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:30b-12: nam mkha' ni go 'byed pa ste /
T02D1185:30b-13: gzugs can gyi rdzas kyi dngos po med pa'o //
T02D1185:30b-14: nam mkha' lta bu ni tshor ba dang /
T02D1185:30b-19: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang /
T02D1185:30b-21: chad par 'gyur ba de rnams su nam mkha' dang 'dra'o //
T02D1185:30b-22: chos kun la zhes bya ba ni phung po dang /
T02D1185:30b-25: rkyen gyis 'byung ba la sogs pa'i chos rnams so //
T02D1185:30b-26: nam mkha' lta bu'i chos de rnams thams cad la
T02D1185:30b-27: bying bar 'gyur ba rgya mtsho chen po'i ku ba
T02D1185:30b-28: lta bur 'phyo ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar rang
T02D1185:30b-29: 'dod pa'i lha nyid kyi gzugs las grub par 'gyur
T02D1185:30b-30: zhes zhu ba'o // rdo rje snying po'i dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1185:30b-33: ku ru ku lle zhes bya ba'i lha nyid mang
T02D1185:30b-34: du gsungs pa de rnams kyi nang nas gang gi
T02D1185:30b-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1185:30b-37: bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pas sam //
T02D1185:30b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1185:30b-39: bdag ni mu stegs kyis nye bar brtags pa'i mchog gi lha ste /
T02D1185:30b-41: des stong pa ni bdag med ma ste /
T02D1185:30b-42: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
T02D1185:30b-43: 'di'i dngos po yod pa ni bdag med ma ste /
T02D1185:30b-44: gang la de yod pa de ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1185:30b-45: de'i rnal 'byor ni phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa'i dbyibs rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1185:30b-46: de ltar rgyud kyi lugs kyis de'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D1185:31a-0: ldan pas bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan @31a
T02D1185:31a-2: gzhan du ku ru ku lle la sogs pa shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1185:31a-3: yang gang zhig shes rab kyi rnal 'byor las kha
T02D1185:31a-4: gzhan du bltas pa de'i tshe 'grub par mi 'gyur
T02D1185:31a-6: yang na he ru ka dpal brtson //
T02D1185:31a-8: gang gi tshe thabs kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D1185:31a-9: 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe dpal he ru la
T02D1185:31a-11: gzhan dag phyag gnyis pa dang /
T02D1185:31a-13: phyag drug pa'i he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa /
T02D1185:31a-14: he ru ka'i sgra mtshungs pa las /
T02D1185:31a-15: gzhan bzlog pa'i phyir he ru ka dpal brtson zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1185:31a-16: 'dis dpal he ru ka la brtson par byed pa'i phyir dpal he ru ka la brtson pa'o //
T02D1185:31a-17: he ru ka'i sgras ni de'i dngos po'am las de mtshan gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1185:31a-18: dpal he ru ka la brtson pa de gang la
T02D1185:31a-19: yod pa de ni dpal he ru ka la brtson
T02D1185:31a-20: pa'o // de yang dpal he ru ka ste zhal brgyad pa zhabs bzhi pa /
T02D1185:31a-21: phyag bcu drug pa 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D1185:31a-22: kye'i rdo rje'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1185:31a-23: 'bras bu nyid 'byung ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1185:31a-24: dpal gyi 'os ma yin pa'i phyir yang he ru ka gzhan bzlog go //
T02D1185:31a-26: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1185:31a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bshad do //
T02D1185:31a-28: de gnyis kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa rnams kyi
T02D1185:31a-29: rtag tu gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun du goms
T02D1185:31a-30: pa'i dus kyi gnas la sogs pa ni //
T02D1185:31a-31: rang gi khyim du mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1185:31a-32: gsungs pa'i lugs kyi dngos grub thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa re zhig ci mdzad ces dogs pa la /
T02D1185:31a-33: zla ba gcig tu gsang la spyad //
T02D1185:31a-35: ji srid phyag rgya ma rnyed pa de srid du
T02D1185:31a-36: gzhan gyis ma rtogs par zla ba gcig tu gsang
T02D1185:31a-37: la spyad de / phyi nas rnal 'byor ma'i bka' lung ngam /
T02D1185:31a-38: bdag nyid nus pas lha dang lha ma yin dang
T02D1185:31a-39: mi la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzang mo bkug nas
T02D1185:31a-40: khyer te / rang nyid kyi dal ba so sor brtag pa'i phyir spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
T02D1185:31a-41: slong mor rgyu zhing g-yo ba ji snyed cig phyag
T02D1185:31a-42: rgya dang ldan pa 'dir mthong yang 'grub par mi
T02D1185:31b-0: 'gyur te / @31b de'i phyir spyod pa la ma
T02D1185:31b-1: dad pa'i sems can rnams kyis dpyad pa'i spyod pa
T02D1185:31b-3: gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1185:31b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:31b-7: 'di'i gsang ba ni nus pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02D1185:31b-8: de'i spyod pa dang dngos grub 'di gsungs kyi /
T02D1185:31b-9: yang lto dgang ba'i dpung gnyen gzhan rnams ni ma yin no //
T02D1185:31b-10: phyag rgya'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya bya ba dang /
T02D1185:31b-11: phyag rgya'i phyag rgya gdan mi phyed pas lhan cig
T02D1185:31b-12: 'grub pa ma yin gyi yang phyag rgya nye bar
T02D1185:31b-13: mtshon pa gcig pus gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1185:31b-14: pa'i dngos grub ni ma yin no //
T02D1185:31b-15: 'on kyang lhan cig mi byed pa'i dngos grub tu
T02D1185:31b-16: 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i
T02D1185:31b-18: mi yi phyag rgya blangs nas ni //
T02D1185:31b-19: de la chos ni rab tu dbye //
T02D1185:31b-20: de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D1185:31b-21: phyag rgya'i dngos grub rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1185:31b-22: mi phyed mtshan nyid phyag rgya yi //
T02D1185:31b-23: dngos grub yo gi'i khyad par 'phags //
T02D1185:31b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1185:31b-25: 'di 'jig rten ji ltar de ltar phyag rgya grub
T02D1185:31b-26: pa yang ci skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram ma
T02D1185:31b-27: yin no zhes dogs pa la /
T02D1185:31b-28: chags dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang //
T02D1185:31b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1185:31b-30: thabs dang shes rab ni thabs dang shes rab ste /
T02D1185:31b-31: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i sems so //
T02D1185:31b-32: gnod mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang
T02D1185:31b-33: 'jig pa de dag gi mi sbyor ba dang mi
T02D1185:31b-34: bskyed pa dang mi 'gag pa zhes bya ba ji
T02D1185:31b-35: snyed pa'o // gang gi phyir de ltar yang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1185:31b-36: gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid //
T02D1185:31b-37: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1185:31b-38: 'dir mdor bsdus nas sngags dang rgyud dang dam tshig rnams dang /
T02D1185:31b-39: chos thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir thabs ni 'byung ba ste /
T02D1185:31b-40: skye ba dang zad pa spangs pa ni sgra'o //
T02D1185:31b-41: 'jig pa ni 'dir rtog pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1185:31b-42: shes rab ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1185:31b-43: de'i phyir de ltar gyur pa'i thabs dang shes rab
T02D1185:31b-44: gnyis su med pa dngos po med pa'i byang chub
T02D1185:31b-45: kyi sems kyi dngos po'i chos gang skye zhing 'gag
T02D1185:31b-46: par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1185:32a-1: dang 'gag pa'i chos ma yin du zin kyang /
T02D1185:32a-2: yang rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa de gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02D1185:32a-4: ci zhig mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1185:32a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i rgyud du gsal zhing rgyas par bka' stsal pa /
T02D1185:32a-6: rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1185:32a-7: gang du yang mi 'gro gar yang mi gnas /
T02D1185:32a-8: thog ma dang tha mal sogs pa rnam par spangs pa /
T02D1185:32a-9: bsnyen pa'i yan lag gnas gsum du snang ba /
T02D1185:32a-14: thams cad kyi sems la gnas pa /
T02D1185:32a-15: ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
T02D1185:32a-16: yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1185:32a-18: dge ba mtshungs pa med pa /
T02D1185:32a-19: lan cig ma yin par 'byung ba mgon po skyob pa /
T02D1185:32a-20: kun tu rtog pa spangs pa /
T02D1185:32a-21: kha dog dang dbyibs dang bral ba /
T02D1185:32a-22: skye ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa /
T02D1185:32a-23: rgyal pos dbye bar dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje /

T02D1185:32a-25: dogs pa med pa'i phyir seng ge / gting dpag
T02D1185:32a-26: dka' ba'i phyir chu'i phung po zhes bya ba la
T02D1185:32a-27: sogs pa de'i phyir 'di'i don du gnyer pa rnams
T02D1185:32a-28: kyi ji ltar 'di lta bu'i dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D1185:32a-30: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1185:32a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1185:32a-32: spros pa dang spros pa med pa'i 'bras bu ni
T02D1185:32a-33: ji ltar rmi lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1185:32a-34: gsungs so // gal te yang dkyil 'khor gyi skabs nyid 'dir yod pa ma yin mod kyi /
T02D1185:32a-35: de ltar yang spros pa bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i
T02D1185:32a-36: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur bsgom par byed pa'i
T02D1185:32a-38: yang na lha nyid kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i lus
T02D1185:32a-39: nyid kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gnyis kyi rnam
T02D1185:32a-41: gal te spros pa'i rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang
T02D1185:32a-42: bzhin de ji ltar spros pa med par yang 'gyur
T02D1185:32a-44: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D1185:32a-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:32a-46: ji ltar shes pa'i bde ba chen po 'di ni byin rlabs te /
T02D1185:32b-1: de bas na de ltar yang 'gyur te /
T02D1185:32b-2: rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir ci zhig 'gal bar 'gyur /
T02D1185:32b-3: de las gzhan 'byung ba med pa'i phyir rnam pa
T02D1185:32b-4: thams cad kyis bdag nyid kyi che ba gsungs pa
T02D1185:32b-5: / bde ba gnag cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1185:32b-6: gal te de skad du dri don du gnyer ba
T02D1185:32b-7: rnams kyis me tog lta bur bde ba don du
T02D1185:32b-8: gnyer ba rnams kyis gzugs len par byed na ni
T02D1185:32b-9: de'i tshe de skye ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyang
T02D1185:32b-10: dngos po nyid do zhe na /
T02D1185:32b-11: lan gdab pa yin mod kyi /
T02D1185:32b-12: dngos nga dngos po nga ma yin //
T02D1185:32b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:32b-14: dngos nga ni rang gsal ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1185:32b-15: gzugs la sogs pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1185:32b-16: dngos po nga ma yin zhes bya ba ni mngon
T02D1185:32b-17: par zhen pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i bde
T02D1185:32b-18: ba 'byung ba'i phyir ji lta bu de me tog
T02D1185:32b-20: bde ba dngos po ma yin du zin kyang sangs rgyas kyang ji ltar yin zhes dogs pa la /
T02D1185:32b-21: dngos po rtogs phyir zhes gsungs te /
T02D1185:32b-22: dngos po rnams ni phyi rol gyi don te phung po dang /
T02D1185:32b-24: rtogs pa ni de rnams kyi de'i rgyu las byung
T02D1185:32b-25: ba'i phung po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid dbyer med
T02D1185:32b-26: pa'i phyir rang gi rang bzhin gyi dngos por rtogs
T02D1185:32b-27: pa'o // de bas na dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir
T02D1185:32b-28: nges par phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa ma
T02D1185:32b-29: gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan du yod
T02D1185:32b-31: de'i phyir de dang de ru gsungs so //
T02D1185:32b-32: sangs rgyas ni phyin ci ma log pa'i chos rnams ji lta bar rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1185:32b-33: 'di ni de phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa ste /
T02D1185:32b-34: gang chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1185:32b-35: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gang yang de shes par dka' ba dang /
T02D1185:32b-36: gsol ba gdab par dka' ba de ltar shes na
T02D1185:32b-37: gal te dngos po rtogs pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid
T02D1185:32b-38: kyis bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes par mi
T02D1185:32b-39: 'gyur ba dang gsol ba gdab par mi 'gyur zhes
T02D1185:32b-40: dogs pa la / nga mi shes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:32b-41: shes par nus kyang ni rmongs pa dang /
T02D1185:32b-42: le lo can gyis shes par mi 'gyur na gang kho na la gsol ba gdab par 'gyur /
T02D1185:32b-43: yin mod kyi bdag gis shes par bya ba bcom
T02D1185:32b-44: ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab pa yang gang du
T02D1185:33a-1: ces bya bar dogs pa la /
T02D1185:33a-2: bde ba can na nga rtag bzhugs //
T02D1185:33a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1185:33a-4: der bcom ldan 'das ci mdzad pas bzhugs snyam pa la /
T02D1185:33a-5: 'chad pa po nga zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:33a-6: nga las 'byung bas gzhan du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir /
T02D1185:33a-8: nyan pa po dang chos so //
T02D1185:33a-9: rang gis tshogs ldan pa zhes bya ba ni chos
T02D1185:33a-10: kyi dbyings gsher ba'i ngo bor yongs su gyur pa
T02D1185:33a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis
T02D1185:33a-12: so // gal te mchog gi mtha' dang /
T02D1185:33a-13: dga' bral gyi dang por bde ba'i bdag nyid bcom
T02D1185:33a-14: ldan 'das dga' ba tsam gyi lus kyis ji ltar
T02D1185:33a-16: gang gis na sangs rgyas yin zhes dogs pa la /
T02D1185:33a-17: de bzhin bus kyang yid ches gyis //
T02D1185:33a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:33a-19: bu ni rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D1185:33a-21: nga ni dga' ba'i bdag nyid de //
T02D1185:33a-22: de bzhin pus kyang yid ches gyis //
T02D1185:33a-23: zhes bya ba la kyang ni bsdu ba'o //
T02D1185:33a-24: yid ches pa ni ye shes 'dis dngos po'i don rtogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1185:33a-26: mar me ltar zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mar
T02D1185:33a-27: me 'dis mun pa 'joms shing dngos po rnams gsal
T02D1185:33a-28: bar byed pa de bzhin du nga'i ye shes kyis
T02D1185:33a-29: mun pa lta bu'i mi shes pa rtsed nas 'joms
T02D1185:33a-30: te / des bsgribs pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po gsal bar byed do //
T02D1185:33a-31: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi lus ji ltar mtshon par bya zhes dogs pa la /
T02D1185:33a-32: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1185:33a-33: gang gi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams dang /
T02D1185:33a-34: dpe byad brgyad cus de mtshon par mi nus sam /
T02D1185:33a-35: nus pa nyid de zhes ngas mtshon par 'gyur ro //
T02D1185:33a-38: mtshan ma yang mang ba yang yin na /
T02D1185:33a-39: yul gang du mtshan ma gang gis btsal bar bya ba yin zhes snyam pa la /
T02D1185:33a-40: bde ba can du zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1185:33a-41: khu ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1185:33a-43: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gsang ba 'di thams cad ni mthun pa ma yin te /
T02D1185:33a-44: gsher ba'i bdag nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das khyod 'khor
T02D1185:33a-45: los brgyan pa'i phyag rgya dang zhabs zhes bya ba
T02D1185:33a-46: la sogs pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams dang
T02D1185:33b-0: / sen mo cung zad dmar ba la @33b sogs
T02D1185:33b-1: pa dpe byad brgyad cu rnams kyis mdzes pa ma
T02D1185:33b-2: yin na gang gis na khyod mtshon par 'gyur /
T02D1185:33b-3: de bas na mi shes pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1185:33b-4: zhes dgongs pa mi shes pas /
T02D1185:33b-5: rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la smod do //
T02D1185:33b-7: mtshan dang dpe byad kyi rgyu rnams ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams so //
T02D1185:33b-8: dbyangs yig bcu drug gis mtshan dang /
T02D1185:33b-9: yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi'i dpe byad de rnams
T02D1185:33b-10: kyis nga mtshon pa de bzhin du ma yin no
T02D1185:33b-12: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
T02D1185:33b-13: sde tshan brgyad kyis yongs su bskor //

T02D1185:58b-13: rgyud rgyal de yi don rtogs shog / thos pa'i

T02D1185:58b-16: mkhas pa'i tsa kor tshogs kyis ni //
T02D1185:58b-17: bsod nams 'di ni btung bar mdzod //
T02D1185:58b-18: slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas
T02D1185:58b-19: mdzad pa dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
T02D1185:58b-20: koo mu di zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02D1185:58b-22: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a ai nta ru tsi ra dang /
